content.html: Kemi Badenoch could have used her first appearance as Women & Equalities Minister to ban conversion therapy, demand better trans healthcare and condemn the rise in LGBT+ hate crimes. Instead, she attacked the CEO of @PinkNews. The entire LGBT+ community have my full support.
content.value:
Kemi Badenoch could have used her first appearance as Women & Equalities Minister to ban conversion therapy, demand better trans healthcare and condemn the rise in LGBT+ hate crimes. 

Instead, she attacked the CEO of @PinkNews. 

The entire LGBT+ community have my full support.
